I’m in agreement with your speculation about the Aunt doing all of this because She felt left out; Im just providing conjecture on possible alternative reasons for WHY she was left out. We don’t know what happened during the previous visit, we don’t know how long the trip is, and we don’t know what the Cousin actually feels about doing His Mom. The Aunt -again- could have been slowly phased out over the course of the previous trip, as you’ve suggested (and Tomoki just outright enjoys doing it with MC’s Mom more), or She might have been told by either her Son or Sister that Tomoki planned on only doing the MC’s Mom during the trip because that’s the only time those 2 have together (Tomoki still enjoys his Mom, this is just something “new and limited”). This doesn’t discredit the Aunt’s feelings on the matter at all (or your assertions), but we simply don’t know enough about the situation that I’d ignore other possibilities (however unlikely) for how everything so far has played out.

gkdINhentai: I’m not sure what exactly you want from me? Any “evidence” would be circumstantial at best because we don’t have a proper time frame, or see the private thoughts/actions of the other characters. Example: We don’t know how many days passed before the Aunt found the MC peeking on the Mom&Cousin (as for why She wasn’t with them the 1st night, it could be the Cousin just wanted to focus on MC’s Mom because he hadn’t seen her in so long, and she was pent-up), nor do we know if She was aware of the MC having found out before She propositioned him; It’s possible She was in the Hall that night because She was planning on joining them. The other example is the end of this part: as I had said in an earlier comment- I think the (possible) reason that the Mom&Cousin were outside the door is because the Aunt had suggested a 3some. —>

..."That way, I(the Aunt) don't stay left out. Could use Hiro's company. Yes, we're going to drug him to keep him out of the loop about you & Tomo. And no, I'm not going to use him adversely, promise! (Not unless he starts asking for it, for revenge sex...)" Then again, my 4th point sounds half-baked and real unconvincing. Why indeed did the Aunt convince the Mom to bring Hiro on this trip? He had missed last summer, he could have easily missed this one too! Was it the Mom's subconscious desire to have him there? Or was it just happenstance plotting from Yukiji Nanao?

So, @puddingdragon21 apologies if I stated my opinions in a too in-your-face manner. Let's sit back now to address your last comment's concerns. I should have done that in my first reply.  1. "Mom getting coerced by Aunt into joining?" We agree on that.  2. "Mom hiding it from Hiro?" Which mom wouldn't out of guilt?  3." finding her Son with her Sister (whilst calling out for Her)?" Happenstance, Yukiji style.  4."what the Aunt actually said/did to convince the Mom into... fucking Tomoki?" Simply this: "Don't tell anyone, & we'll let you join us. You've been lonely & sexless for too long. You'll love sex with Tomo. Now be a good girl, come over and taste this shota meal." 4."Convincing Mom into bringing along the MC for this trip?" MC admits in Ch1, Pg1 he's been regularly vacationing summers at Aunt's, except the last year. Besides, Aunt probably said sth like "You want this exclusive arrangement to continue with Tomo next summer, you better bring Hiro along. Contd...

And on the Mom part: while the actual course of the story depends on the actions of the Aunt, I personally feel like the Narrative Satisfaction of the story is dependent on the MC’s Mom; because regardless of the Aunt’s motivations, the MC’s happiness is tied to his Mother’s reaction/reasoning/decision. My final personal opinion (literally just my feelings, which nobody here has any reason to care about) on the story itself (once all of the chapters have come out and the story is fully finished) will be based on whether or not the MC is successful in “getting back” his Mom. (I think you may have misinterpreted my other comment a bit, I apologize if I was unclear)

gkdINhentai: When I said “how it plays out”, I was just trying to (poorly) convey my thought that if everything did happen as you’ve layed out, I would hope the Author takes time next chapter to actually go over it in a way that satisfyingly connects all the dots (I want to know HOW the Aunt coerced her Sister, I don’t just want a hand waved “she persuaded her somehow”), otherwise I agree with almost everything you’ve said (The Aunt being left out of the bath and no 3some could have been the Mom deciding that it would be too risky if they ALL disappeared on the MC, but that doesn’t discredit the Aunt herself feeling left out). ->

@gkdINhentai simple(ish), (seemingly) straightforward, probably the most likely way for the story to play out, though I don’t entirely agree (I’m fully aware of how utterly ridiculous my own speculations are, I’ve said as such in my own comments). It all really depends on how the Author plays it out; personally, my opinion on the whole story (once it’s done) is going to depend almost entirely on what (if anything) the MC’s Mom thinks/feels about this ENTIRE situation (catching her Sister&Nephew, getting coerced into joining, hiding it from her Son, and finding her Son with her Sister (whilst calling out for Her)). I’d also be a bit annoyed if we never get an explanation on what the Aunt actually said/did to convince the Mom of ANY of this (fucking Tomoki, bringing along the MC for this trip, getting her outside the door for the end reveal of this current chapter). But I get the feeling that most of that will end up getting skimmed over/ignored entirely, which would make me disappointed

Here's an Ockham's Razor-ish explantaion, a simple explanation so that you can thwart of all those complicated explanations below. 
Aunt incites her own son into incest, her twin sis discovers them in the act despite their assumed token precautions. Twin sis (MC's mom) derides the incestuous nature of the relationship, but gets pulled into it because of the probably sexless life she'd been leading. MC's counsin, besides, begins preferring MC's mom for sex, knowing how pushy his own mom is. With this new relationship between MC's Mom and the cousin heating up toward the end of a probably almost never-ending trip, neglected Aunt takes matters into her own hands  and forces MC's mom to bring her son on the next trip. Her secret intentions being: she'll get to whet her appetite for illicit sex SOMEHOW, knowing she'll again be forced into the sidelines as there's been little evidence thus far that her own son and her sis are into sharing a threesome with her. And really, the biggest issue (that I at least personally have) with this entire story is that it hinges on WHY the MC came on this trip in the 1st place. Regardless of the Aunt’s intentions, she would have had to have a REALLY good reason to convince the Mom to drag MC along (even if the Aunt had plans in place to “keep him from finding out” it would be utterly ridiculous for the Mom to take that insanely unnecessary risk with no clear benefit). Because remember, the VERY FIRST PAGE of part 1 is the MC bemoaning how his Mom basically dragged him along (And if there is no big planned reveal or reasoning, then I’ll be annoyed because it literally just means his Moms an idiot).

I agree that “realistically” the Mom probably had no intention of the MC finding out (I feel like that’s the one thing that’s established and clear in all of this), but I’d argue Her desire for Him is still up in the air (I’d think she must have at least considered it, after fucking the Cousin). But I honestly doubt that the Aunt had some malicious plan in place to ruin his life, her actions and reactions don’t line up too well with that idea; And I doubt the Author would go for some reveal in the next chapter that she was “totally faking it the whole time”. And Like I said earlier: If the Aunt’s intention was to “steal back” her Sister from the MC, then it would be far simpler to do if He WASN’T THERE. Because once the Mom learns about this she’d (“realistically”) come to distrust her Sister and want to leave (And I know “its hentai”, characters rarely, if ever, make decisions like real people, NTR especially, but that twist would be such a stretch it’d make Mr Fantastic jealous)
